column1: The Purple Pig////The sweet corn was simple and refreshing
column2: but I probably wouldn't order it again. Pork secreto was surprisingly delicious - the meat was lean but tender and super flavorful. The pickled watermelon that came with it was a little overwhelming. The pork belly was cooked well and also very tender. For dessert
column3: we got the fig tart which was paired with espresso mascarpone. It was definitely an interesting flavor combo but wasn't bad! Not too sweet
